data.text: @FabianoCFX @jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko And additional information. Louis Garrel will play the role of Alfred Dreyfus.
@FabianoCFX @jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko The film will cost 30 million euros, will be in French and will be shot in France.

@FabianoCFX @jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko The film will be based on the book "An Officer and a Spy" by Robert Harris. Harris wrote it in 2013 at the personal request of Polański. And it is like a movie script. Excellent. I recommend reading.
@kapec6666 @jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko This future Polanskis movie is about The Tenent Dreyfuss and Zolas book J Accuse one true and sad history like The Allens linching by Me Too moviment
@jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko It's been reported so much that Allen will not make a new movie, it's a MeToo effect, but why not inform about it:  https://t.co/KOGn4BBWxs

If you want to have a good laugh, check the reader comments below this article. Until yesterday, you could have read mine, but they prefer only-like minded comments. What really put them over the edge was Justin Levine‘s irrefutable new essay.
@MissHavisham10 Thin skin. If they are in the business of journalism, good luck. They’ve already shown they’re gutless.
@jeanpierreleduc Holy smokes they deleted every last comment that was supportive (presumably) of WA or of due process and innocent till proven guilty. Figures they're from Portland, but yikes.
@sjgeimer @jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko I like this photo, Jude Law and Allen. The same face.

@sjgeimer @KristyPuchko Puchko continues, "Allen will not face justice or even his daughter’s accusations head-on." Shouldn't writers learn the facts of the case? He DID face justice, in '93. He was thoroughly investigated in NY and CT, & was cleared. Read this essay & learn. https://t.co/3NCw0ppe5T

@sjgeimer @KristyPuchko Yes, and Amazon is now the world's second trillion dollar company. In "punishing" WA, they're depriving audiences of seeing the work of hundreds: the actors, the DoP, the AD, crew, set designers et al. It's completely, totally stupid & does NOTHING to address the #MeToo movement.
@jeanpierreleduc @KristyPuchko It is becoming obvious where the heart of Jeff Bezos and Amazon lie, it appears to be profits first at any cost.
